org.apache.flink.client.web

Class JobsServlet

  • java.lang.Object
    • javax.servlet.GenericServlet
      • javax.servlet.http.HttpServlet
        • org.apache.flink.client.web.JobsServlet
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    Serializable, javax.servlet.Servlet, javax.servlet.ServletConfig

    public class JobsServlet
extends javax.servlet.http.HttpServlet
    A servlet that accepts uploads of pact programs, returns a listing of the directory containing the job jars, and deleting these jars.
    See Also:
    Serialized Form

    • Constructor Summary

      Constructors 
      Constructor and Description
      JobsServlet(File jobsDir, File tmpDir, String targetPage)
      Creates a new JobServlet, configured with the given directories and the given result page.

    • Constructor Detail

      • JobsServlet

        public JobsServlet(File jobsDir,
           File tmpDir,
           String targetPage)
        Creates a new JobServlet, configured with the given directories and the given result page.
        Parameters:
        jobsDir - The directory to store uploaded jobs in.
        tmpDir - The directory for temporary files.
        targetPage - The page to redirect to after a successful upload.
